wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Brewin is a British academic and expert on Cyprus. He has been Senior Lecturer in International Relations in Keele University, Staffordshire, England, since 1972 who died July 2018.

response: * Christopher Brewin, "European Union and Cyprus" (Huntingdon: Eothen Press, 2000)
